page1.certDeny: Has your USDOT/FMCSA medical certificate ever been denied or issued for lessthan 2 years?
page1.surgery: Have you ever had surgery? If Yes please list and explain below.
page1.takingMedications: Are you currently taking medications ?If yes please describe below.

data.doYouHave: Do you have or have you ever had

page2.5: Heart disease, heart attack, bypass, or other heart problems
page2.6: Pacemaker,stents, implantable devices, or other heart procedures
page2.9: Chronic (long-term) cough, shortness of breath, or other breathing problems
page2.11: Kidney problems, kidney stones, or pain/problems with urination
page2.14: Anxiety, depression, nervousness, other mental health problems
page2.16: Dizziness, headaches, numbness, tingling, or memory loss
page2.19: Missing or limited use of arm, hand, finger, leg, foot, toe
page2.21: Bone, muscle, joint, or nerve problems
page2.24: Chronic (long-term) infection or other chronic diseases
page2.25: Sleep disorders, pauses in breathing while asleep, daytime sleepiness, loud snoring
page2.26: Have you ever had a sleep test (e.g., sleep apnea)?
page2.27: Have you ever spent a night in the hospital?
page2.28: Have you ever had a broken bone?
page2.29: Have you ever used or do you now use tobacco?
page2.31: Have you used an illegal substance within the past two years?
page2.32: Have you ever failed a drug test or been dependent on an illegal substance?

data.otherHealthCondition: Other health condition(s) not described above
data.answer: Did you answer "yes" to any of questions 1-32? If so, please comment further on those health conditions below.
